Translations.Text: Â£iwlet ar ssmae s$uo Mass nnwen, akked Loennet iwsaan am tmurt akked igenwan. Teppuhegga d i wid ipeezziben
wid ipseddiqen - saan ne$ xuuuen -, wid isnusun reffu, wid ipsemmieen i medden - Oebbi Ieemmel lauuam
wid, ma xedmen tucmip, ne$ densen iman nnsen, a d mmektin Oebbi, ad ste$foen $ef ibekkaven nnsen. Anwa Ipsemmieen ibekkaven siwa Oebbi? Ur pgerninen deg wayen xedmen, u nitni eoan
Widak, akafi nnsen d ssmae n Mass nnsen, akked leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkoen. D arraz igerzen i wid issewqamen
Aaddant tedyanin uqbel nnwen. Iniget di tmurt, walit amek tevoa d wid id iggaren tikerkas
Wagi d abeggen i medden, d nnhaya akked unecced i wid ipeezziben
Ur ppifcilet, ur $webnet, d kunwi i iaalayen, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Ma ieuza kwen lada, ni$ lada i t icban ieuza agdud. Ussan agi Nerra ten, ger medden, d tidwal, iwakken ad Yissin Oebbi wid iumnen, ad Iddem segwen inagan. Oebbi ur Ieemmel ara imednas
